content.text: Faye Reagan, whose real name is Faye Jillian Henning, was born and raised in Las Vegas, Nevada.

Reagan makes no mention of religion and neither do any of her bios or webpages, as far as I can tell. Her hometown of Las Vegas has a significantly lower religious population than the rest of the country,
which probably doesn't surprise too many of you. And there's the fact that she's a porn star. That probably doesn't help either.
And okay, this is a stretch, but the bio on Twitter page reads,
As far as right and wrong, I know the difference, but right is oh so dull…and I'm not interested.

So she's obviously not too concerned with following any Biblically prescribed set of morals. Maybe she's a Satanist? All right, probably not. Let's move onto to our equally fact-deprived section on politics.
No, Ronald Reagan was not her great granddaddy

content.sourceTitle: What relation is Faye Reagan to former president Ronald Reagan, if any?
content.text: As much as some fans might wish it to be true,
Faye Reagan does not share any relation with the 40th president of the United States. Reagan is just a stage name. Sorry folks.

She also does not seem to share any relation to the political discourse of the country or the world. Not even anything about her first amendment right to free speech, which has a hand in protecting her industry from those who would deprive the populace of her freckly on-screen antics.
If you have a shred of evidence we could point to in regard to Reagan's political or religious beliefs, give us a holler in the comments.
